timeline.bodyText: instead, can we replace this with ${compile.warnings-flag}? We'd like to keep the -Werror on ksql builds, and we have setup upstream builds to set this to false. Not sure why it wasn't updated in this pom! (all the other modules have it set like that)
timeline.author: agavra

replies.bodyText:
@agavra Are there several places where this change needs to happen?  I count 10 below?
$ find . -name pom.xml -exec egrep "compile.warnings-flag|Werror" {} \; -ls
                        <arg>${compile.warnings-flag}</arg>

                        <arg>-Werror</arg>

replies.bodyText: other than the ksqldb-udf-quickstart they can probably all be changed! good catch
replies.author: agavra

timeline.bodyText: i think this one should stay as it's an archetype resource (so it isn't built through the usual ksql build); we could also remove it entirely but let's punt that for another time
timeline.author: agavra
